{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$715.2K in 2021-2022** on contracts with ROLLING TIDES CONSTRUCTION.

Across 12 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 3 have at least one amendment (25%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 16% and the average number of amendments was 1. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$49.7K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.57 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$432.8K. The longest contract was 1.92 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$1.9M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
